SEARCH
Package musicSerialization

Klasse MusicCollection

java.lang.Object
musicSerialization.MusicCollection
Alle implementierten Schnittstellen:
Serializable
public class MusicCollection extends Object implements Serializable
Represents a collection of music entities including artists, albums, and songs.

This class is serializable and manages three lists:

  • Artists
  • Albums
  • Songs
